explains: n. 化疗（等于 chemotherapy）；化学疗法

sentences.en: The first time I had chemo I was quite scared.
sentences.cn: 第一次做化疗时，我很害怕。

sentences.en: White cell count linked with chemo death.
sentences.cn: 白细胞数量与化疗导致死亡的联系。

sentences.en: And after doctors visits, surgery, chemo, hair loss, pain.
sentences.cn: 之后，去拜访了外科医生，进行化疗，开始脱发，伴随着疼痛。
